hunted.title: Hunted by MovieHunt
hunted.subtitle: Our favorite films, personally selected by our team
hunted.whatDescription: Hunted by MovieHunt is our badge of excellence. It identifies films that particularly touched us, that we loved and that we want to share with you. These are our personal favorites, the films we would recommend to a friend.
hunted.criteriaDescription: A film receives the Hunted badge when:
hunted.criterion1: It particularly moved or impressed our team
hunted.criterion2: It offers a unique or memorable cinematic experience
hunted.criterion3: It deserves more recognition or is underrated
hunted.criterion4: We would recommend it without hesitation to our friends
hunted.notRatingDescription: The Hunted badge is not a rating. A film can have a lower score but still receive this badge because it touched us in a special way. It's our personal and subjective selection.
hunted.metaTitle: Hunted by MovieHunt - Our Favorite Films | MovieHunt
hunted.metaDescription: Discover films that received the Hunted by MovieHunt badge, our personal selection of films that particularly touched us.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.subtitle: Our methodology for selecting and reviewing films
howWeWork.intro: At MovieHunt, we are passionate about cinema and we want to share our discoveries with you. Here's how we work to offer you quality recommendations.
howWeWork.selectionDescription: We watch a wide variety of films, from recent releases to classics, from blockbusters to independent films. Each film is carefully chosen for its potential interest.
howWeWork.reviewDescription: After watching a film, we take the time to analyze it in depth. We evaluate the direction, screenplay, acting, cinematography, soundtrack and overall impact.
howWeWork.ratingDescription: Our ratings are on a scale of 1 to 10. They reflect our overall appreciation of the film, taking into account all aspects of the cinematic experience.
howWeWork.huntedDescription: Some films receive our Hunted by MovieHunt badge. These are films that particularly touched us and that we want to highlight, regardless of their rating.
howWeWork.transparencyDescription: We are independent and receive no compensation from studios or streaming platforms. Our opinions are honest and reflect our genuine appreciation.
howWeWork.metaTitle: How We Work - Our Methodology | MovieHunt
howWeWork.metaDescription: Discover how we select and review films at MovieHunt. Our methodology, rating system and selection criteria.
